Change is Coming, Do You Feel It Too?

Published on January 9, 2025

Daily writing prompt
Come up with a crazy business idea.
View all responses

I feel like I am about to crack a code, but I’m not sure which code.

Lately, there’s this feeling I can’t shake, like something big is on the way. I don’t know exactly what it is, but it’s hard to ignore. It’s as if the world is holding its breath, waiting for some kind of shift, and I can’t help but feel it too.

Here’s what I’ve realized: big changes don’t just happen out of nowhere. Sure, they might feel sudden when they arrive, but they’re usually the result of seeds we’ve already planted. That’s why the work we’re doing now, even when it feels small or repetitive, is so important. When the moment comes and the change reveals itself, we’ll either be ready to embrace it, or we’ll be stuck wishing we had done more to prepare.

I don’t know about you, but I’d rather be ready. That means putting in the effort now, even when it’s unclear exactly what I’m working toward. It’s about building the habits, taking the steps, and setting the foundation for whatever’s coming next. Because when it finally arrives, I don’t want to be caught off guard… I want to step into it confidently.

So, yeah, I don’t have all the answers. My craziest business idea is literally believing in myself. But I do know this: something’s coming. If you feel it too, let’s use this time wisely. Let’s do the work now so that when the change arrives, we’re more than ready.

Do you feel it too?
